Here are the details :"},{"text":""}]}],"mode":"simple"}],"applicability":{"value":"","mode":"query"},"secure":false},"98b6113d062241a4b8c91b8ead4a7c26":{"id":"98b6113d062241a4b8c91b8ead4a7c26","stepType":"LinkOutput","name":"Inserted Record Link","url":{"value":"(function execute() {

    var recordId = vaInputs.record_id.getValue();

})()
","mode":"script"},"label":{"value":"(function execute() {
    var message = '';
    var gr = new GlideRecord(vaInputs.record_table.getValue());
    if (gr.get(vaInputs.record_id.getValue()))
        message = gs.getMessage('View submitted request ({0})', gr.getDisplayValue(gr.getDisplayName()));

    return message;
})()
